inn1.comm: Starts off with a short ball and Dilshan pulls that through midwicket for a boundary. No getting his eye in, etc for Dilshan
Much better delivery, a hint of swing for Shoiab, length ball just outside off, Dilshan wafts at it without any foot movement and is beaten outside off
that one seamed away a little after pitching a touch wider outside off, Dilshan plays inside the line of it as it goes through to the keeper
Whoah! That one nipped back from a short of a length, Dilshan trusted the bounce on that one and lets it go, the ball sails over the stumps
fuller ball on middle and leg this time, hits Dilshan's pads and trickles away behind square
good ball to finish, a tight line on off, Dilshan is content to defend it off the back foot towards cover
Tanvir starts off with a no-ball, way over the line, he didn't hear the call and was appealing for lbw after rapping Jayasuriya on middle and off
Tanvir sends a back-of-the-hand slower ball well outside off which Jayasuriya swipes for a single to midwicket
back of a length ball, Dilshan defends off the back foot towards cover
plays it to the off side with soft hands and takes a single
well outsie off and Jayasuriya isn't interested in that one, lets it through to the keeper
superb delivery to end the over, angling across Dilshan, a bit of movement away and Dilshan is beaten as he tries to defend it
back of a length ball, on off, gets a thick outside edge off Jayasuriya and thr ball runs away towards third man
Well, Dilshan showing he's not going to hang around, he swings wildly at one that was wide outside off
closer to the stump this time, Dilshan thrashes it square past a diving backward point fielder
moves in towards Dilshan off a length, Dilshan plays it watchfully towards covers
Dilshan's beaten by pace, almost a repeat of this over's second ball, Dilshan throws his bat at a wide ball but connects only with air
pitching outside off and coming in to Dilshan, who defends off the front foot to the off side
pitched up, Jaysuriya gets on the front foot and bunts it towards mid-off
good length, pitching on middle and leg, Dilshan punches it towards mid-off for a sngle
short ball, slow and just outside off, Jayasuriya is cramped for room, plays it towards midwicket
length ball outside off, Jayasuriya thrashes at it but mistimes it horribly, and the ball bounces away towards point
Direct hit from Umar Gul at mid-on, the Pakistan fielder go up in appeal but the umpire thinks the batsman is safe, doesn't even refer it to the third umpire
Jayasuriya gets hold of it this time, and cuts it powerfully in the air over point for four
Shoaib bangs it in short, doesn't bounce very much, Dilshan picks it up and deposits it towards the midwicket boundary, he played that off the front foot
Dilshan throws everything at that one but mistimes it to short midwicket
slanting into middle and leg, lovely shot from Dilshan, a controlled, wristy on-drive, finds the gap between mid-on and short midwicket to get another boundary
dropped, that was pitched up, outside off, Dilshan goes for a booming drive, gets the outside edge, a regulation catch for Younis Khan at slip but he puts it down
another edge but it goes wide of slip, and races away towards third man
back of a length and wide ball, Dilshan upper cuts it to the right of third man
length ball, pitching on leg, Dilshan doesn't bother with footwork as he tries to slam it towards midwicket, inside-edges on to his pad, a muted appeal from the bowler
short ball from Tanvir, but it's down the leg side and Jayasuriya doesn't connect with an attempted hook
whistles down the leg side again, and that's another wide
Tanvir overcompensates fro those two wides by giving room outside off, Jayasuriya flails at it gets a bottom edge which rolls away towards cover
angling away from Dilshan, who swings hard at it, gets another edge, but a thick one, and the ball flies towards third man
much better delivery, on a length, on middle stump, Dilshan punches it towards mid-on for a single
short ball, not too much width but enough for Jayasuriya to use his wrists and launch it behind point for a boundary
overpitched, wide ball, Jayasuriya steps into a booming drive that rockets through the covers for a boundary
short of a length, sliding towards leg, a gift for Dilshan as fine leg was up in the ring, and he guides it for another boundary
a little bit of width, no half measure from Dilshan again, his attempted drive gets a thick edge which sails over the infield for a boundary to third man
Shoaib responds with the fast bowler's stock reply, a bouncer, Dilshan was shaping to pull it but decides against it at the last moment
length ball outside off, Dilshan drives away from his body, beats the infield but the timing wasn't quite right, Shoiab Malik runs to the boundary from mid-off to cut it off
overpitched outside off, Sensible batting from Jayasuriya, who pushes it softly towards mid-off, and Sri Lanka pinch a quick single
good variation from Shoaib, runs his fingers across the seam and the slower delivery (111 kmph) surprises Dilshan, who inside edges it on to his thigh pad
short of a length, in the corridor outside off, Jayasuriya jumps on to his front foot but is content to defend it back to the bowler
a fuller ball this time, maintains that tight line, Jayasuriya doesn't get any space to free his arms, and he blocks it back down the ground
almost a repeat of the previous delivery, Jayasuriya manages to get some power behind a straight drive but that crashes into the stumps at the bowler's end
Iftikhar sticks to a good line and length, Jayasuriya defends back to the bowler
a slower ball this time, Jayasuriya spots it but doesn't quite get hold of it, his thrash balloons in the air but lands safely away from mid-off
get holds of it this time, steps down and unleashes a rasping cover drive, and the fielders barely move as it zooms past cover
starts off with a full ball, Dilshan slices it towards Shahid Afridi at cover point
slower ball, pitched up and gives Dilshan lots of room, Dilshan doesn't worry about footwork as he square-drives that for a boundary
Dilshan walks down the track and works it past the short midwicket for an easy two
He's gone this time, short ball, sat up to be hit, Dilshan pulls it but straight to Salman Butt at fine leg. That's a huge relief for Pakistan and the fans find their voice again
a short delivery on leg stump to start off for Sangakkara, who doesn't get any bat on it, goes through to the keeper
another short ball to end the over, better line this time, on middle, Sangakkara gets on the back foot and defends it back to the bowler
back of a length ball, Iftikhar keeps pegging away at an offstump line, Jayasuriya is cramped for room and he can only block it back to the bowler
a touch fuller this time, but that nagging line keeps Jayasuriya quiet, again he pushes it back own the ground
Iftikhar strays from that tight line, bowls it on Jayasuriya's pads, and the batsman has an eay job flicking it uppishly between mid-on and midwicket
too close to his body to free his arms again, Jayasuriya steps out to try to thraash that one but edges it towards cover
Jayasuriya shows again how he is not just all about power, a short of a length ball on middle and leg and Jayasuriya glances it for a boundary
Another drop, Shahid Afridi at cover-point is the guilty fielder this time, a rank, bad ball from Iftikhar - a full toss well outside off -and Jayasuriya flays it straight to Afridi but survives
Gul angles it across Sangakkara who lets that one sail through to the keeper
short of a length ball, similar line, Sangakkara shoulders arms again
fuller delivery this time, Sangakkara takes a step down and pushes it towards mid-off for a single
Gul digs in the bouncer, 139.9 kmph, well-directed as well, on offstump, Jayasuriya ducks under it
Gul's fortunate to get away conceding just one run there, it was on Jayasuriya's pads but the batsman doesn't get any bat on the ball, and it dribbles away to square leg for a leg bye
about a foot outside off stump, Sangakkara isn't tempted by those sort of deliveries this early in his innings
another full toss, well outside off, higher than the one Iftikhar finished the previous oner with, Jayasuriya slices that towards third man
length delivery, wonderful line from Iftikhar, Jayasuriya defends it towards mid-off
not that wonderful a line this time, on legstump and is lucky Jayasuriya is unable to put that away for a boundary
reverts to pegging away at off stump, Jayasuriya is kept quiet by that line and length again
Jayasuriya plays it with soft hands towards cover for a single
short of a length, a touch wide outside off, Sangakkara is content with shouldering arms to that one
good ball to start the over, good line and length, Jayasuriya defends it towards midwicket
Gul strikes again, Jayasuriya is plumb lbw. A very full ball on middle and leg, Jayasuriya was stuck in his crease and he missed it, no doubt at all about that decision, huge wicket for Pakistan
in the corridor outside off, Jayawardene lets that go through to the keeper
runs it down towards third man for a single
short of a length ball on Sangakkara's pads, he tucks it away towards deep square leg, very well timed and they pick up a couple
better line this time, on middle and off, Sangakkara defends it watchfully

Gone! Jayawardene's horror run continues, short of a length ball, pitches on off and moves a touch away, Jayawardene feathers it through to the keeper and the complexion of the game has changed in five deliveries
he gets a similar delivery to the one that got rid of Jayawardene, jus a touch wider this one, and he lets it go
similar line from Iftikhar, Kapugedera thinks of playing it but withdraws his bat at the last moment
fuller ball, Kapugedera gets in a big stride as he drives it to cover, doesn't beat the field though
Defended off the front foot by Kapugedera for another dot ball
pitched up, on middle and leg, Kapugedera flicks it towards mid-on, and that completes the first maiden of the innings
back of a length, angling across Sangakkara, who dabs it off the back foot towards cover
a similar delivery from Gul, Sangakkara is content to defend it towards the bowler off the back foot
this time it's on Sangakkara's stumps, and the batsman get an easy single by tucking it towards square leg
Kapugedera gets off the mark, works it away to deep square leg
overpitched ball outside off, Sangakkara lets that one go through to the keeper
the length's shorter this time, but the same line, and Sangakkara shoulders arms again
moves a touch into Kapugedera, who inside edges it onto his pads
well outside off, Kapugedera isn't interested in that one
closer to the stumps, Kapugedera glides that down to third man using the pace of the ball
strays on to the pads, Sangakkara glances it fine and the fielder at fine leg has to do some fancy footwork to keep the ball in the field, the batsmen get enough time to get three
length ball outside off, Kapugedera punches it off the backfoot towards cover
overpitched, a bit of movement into the batsman, Kapugedera adjusts well and drives it down the ground for a well-timed boundary
pitches back of a length, Sanga gets back and across and defends
change of pace, commits Sanga to the front foot and he pushes the ball gently to cover, no chance of a run there
and that will be the 100 for Sri Lanka as Gul pitches outside Sanga's pads and the batsman coolly flicks the ball down to fine leg
pitches full and Kapugedera defends to the off side
firm stroke off the front foot, Kapugedera meets the ball on the half-volley and drives it straight to cover
attempted yorker ends up a full toss which he clips to midwicket
pitches full and thats punched confidently but straight to cover
lands on off stump and this time he plays it straighter to mid-off
thats too straight and Kapugedera knocks it to the on side for one
pitches full and wide and no shot offered
slower ball pitches on a good length and he gets well forward
an even slower ball, gets Sanga onto the front foot in defence
very tidy stuff, right up there on the dime and he can only defend
ah, there's the bouncer, which is used to good effect to squeeze in another dot ball, pitches and goes over the batsman, who ducks under it with ease
a shot of aggression this time, albeit on the rise and safely over mid-off and extra cover, Gul pitches full and Kapugedera meets it with an aerial drive off the front foot
pitches on leg stump and turned uppishly past square leg
slips in the yorker, which he digs out to midwicket
nearly squares him up there with one that lands outside leg stump and straightens, Kapugedera  pushes down the wrong line, ball rolls to point
Length ball, and a bit of width, Sangakkara leans into a square drive for a single
Slightly overpitched on middle and off, Kapugedera pushes it towards mid-on
Shimmies down the track, but decides against playing an aggressive strokes, just punching it towards cover
slips towards the leg side, Kapugedera tucks it behind square for a single
overpitched and on Sangakkara's pads, the batsman gets a big stride in, picks his spots and times his on-drive to perfection, and that's a boundary
width provided outside off, good length, Sangakkara reaches out and pushes it towards cover
Starts off with a slightly slower ball, back of a length and outside off, Kapugedera works it to the sweeper on the off side
Shoaib goes up for a big appeal, but that pitched way outside leg stump, a very optimistic shout from Shoaib
well outside off, Kapugedera isn't tempted into playing at that one, lets it sail through to the keeper
some width provided again, Kapugedera leans into a cover drive, which fetches him a single
that kept low, Sangakkara adjusted well at the last moment to defend it off the front foot, would have been a much closer lbw shout if he had missed that one
uses his wrists to turn a leg-stump offering to fine leg for a single
starts off with an overpitched ball outside off, defended by Sangakkara towards off stump
a bit of extra bounce but Sangakkara rides the bounce with an angled bat, and tickles the ball past the vacant slip region for a boundary
straying on leg stump this time, Sangakkara sweeps it wonderfully for another boundary, that was superbly placed
watchfully defended by Sangakkara towards the bowler this time
on the leg stump, balloons off the pads towards square leg
down the leg side, and that will be a wide
flighted delivery, Sangakkara pushes it back to Afridi
starts off with a slower delivery, 110 kmph, it's short and wide and Kapugedera guides it towards third man
better line and length this time, Sangakkara is squared up and gets a leading edge towards the bowler as he tries to turn it to the leg side
pitched up outside off, driven towards midwicket for a single
Shoaib tries a shorter ball, Kapugedera ducks under it quite easily
good ball, moves a touch away after pitching around middle stump, Kapugedera is drawn towards the ball and gets beaten
short and wide, Kapugedera lashes that towards deep point
overpitched, Sangakkara steps out of the crease and punches it towards mid-on
length ball, Kapugedera decides to play off the back foot, gets a thick bottom edge which goes towards backward point
tossed up by Afridi, but it's down the leg side, and Sangakkara's attempted sweep doesn't make contact
pushed towards mid-off this time for a single
another boundary through the vacant slip region, this was an unintentional boundary though, thick outside edge from Kapugedera
angles it to gully, no run there
slaps a wide delivery outside off towards the sweeper on the off side
Shoiab overpitches, and slides it towards the leg stump, Kapugedera picks up some easy runs by flicking it towards midwicket
a bit of width provided, Kapugedera tries to dispatch it square on the off, but mistimes it towards backward point
short of length, punches it towards the sweeper on the off side
short, slower ball on middle stump, Sangakkara was thinking of getting out of its way but pulls it towards midwicket after realising how slow it is
full ball, just outside off, Kapugedera leans into an off drive
Sangakkara doesn't get his timing right on an attempted off drive, and the ball trickles away towards mid-off
Kapugedera lunhges forward to defend, but gets a thick outside edge and the ball rolls away towards cover point
Afridi goes up in appeal after rapping the pads, but that was clearly sliding down the leg side

he's gone this time, bowled him, Kapugedera steps out and tries to work a length ball on middle and off towards the leg side, against the spin too, he misses it completely and that's Pakistan's fourth wicket
flighted ball, the wrong one, some turn there, Mubarak gets a thick outside edge towards point
huge turn this time, pitches on a length just outside off and spins a long way away from the batsman, who lets it go
much less spin this time, but Mubarak is content leaving that outside off stump ball alone as well
flighted delivery, accurate one to start, length and on off, Sangakkara defends watchfully
same line, but a touch fuller, Sangakkara gets on the front foot and punches it to mid-off
on middle and off, Mubarak defends off the front foot
on middle and leg, Mubarak pats it towards mid-on
overpitched on off, Sangakkara drives it firmly down the ground fro a single
quicker delivery outside off, batsman blocks it
overpitched outside off, Sangakkara crunches it towards mid-off
on leg stump this time, Sangakkara tries to sweep it
similar line,Sangakkara can't capitalise again
outside off this time, defended towards mid-off
and again, Sangakkara unable to find the gap in the infield
this time he plays it with soft hands towards mid-off and picks up a single to retain the strike
tossed up, outside off, Sangakkara goes for a big sweep but can't connect
shorter ball, Sangakkara punches it off the back foot towards mid-on
outside off, Mubarak drives it towards cover
outside the leg stump, Sangakkara rocks back and nudges it off his pads for a single
overpitched on off, Mubarak gets a big stride in as he defends
full delivery outside off, Sangakkara shows the full face of the bat as he plays it towards mid-off
shorter delivery, turns the other way, batsman gets on the back foot and turns it away to midwicket
outside leg stump, and that's another easy single fro Sri Lanka
better line but the singles continue to flow as Mubarak pushes it towards mid-off
defends a full ball outside off
shorter and a bit of width, Sangakkara lashes it through covers for another single
defended towards the bowler
Malik isn't flighting the ball much here, again the ball is tapped towards the bowler
outside off, Sangakkara gets on the backfoot and punches it towards mid-off
Mubarak is getting his runs in singles, this time to cover
played with soft hands towards cover point
overpitched outside leg stump, batsman clips it between mid-on and midwicket fro a single
The spinners keep feeding the batsmen outside leg stump deliveries, they have got away for a while but this time Sangakkara gets the placement right on his sweep and gets a boundary
shorter ball, Sangakkara puts it away towards midwicket for a single
again outside leg, the wrong 'un, thuds into Mubarak's pads
another ball on the pads, Mubarak works that away towards square leg
a full ball that is very wide, Sangakkara reaches out and crunches it towards extra cover
Another single for Sri Lanka, as Mubarak rocks back and pushes it towards cover

A run-out as the batsmen looked to pinch a quick double, Sangakkara turns it towards square leg, Mubarak charges out of his crease believing a second was there for the taking but is is sent back, Misbah-ul-Haq fires a flat throw and Mubarak is nowhere in the scene
tossed up, Maharoof defends it back to the bowler
Malik keeps it tight, on a length, defended again
opens the face but doesn't beat the fielder at backward point
easy single as he pushes the ball towards mid-off
speared down leg side, Maharoof tickles that down towards fine leg
very very wide ball, slipped from Afridi's hands, a half-tracker which angles very wide of off stump
blocked back to the bowler
gets the single this time, by punching it down the ground
turned towards square leg for another single
gets the ball to move away after pitching on off, back of a length delivery, Maharoof swings at it but doesn't make contact
fuller ball, just outside off, Maharoof guides it towards third man for a single

The big wicket of Sangakkara. His innings is sawed off at 49, as Sangakkara decides to upper cut the ball at the last moment, after intially shaping to let the bouncer outside off go, Salman Butt at backward point dives to his right and completes an athletic catch
A footwork-free waft, to a short of length ball just outside off, from Thushara ends up in a simple catch to the keeper, the faintest of edges and Iftikhar is on a hat-trick
quick, overpitched ball just outside off, Kulasekara looks to defend it but ends up playing inside the line as the ball goes through to the keeper
superb line from Iftikhar, that was homing in on the off bail, Kulasekara defends it off the back foot towards cover
flighted, full delivery, blocked back to the bowler
whistling down leg, and the batsman helps it on its way to fine leg
good delivery from Afridi, went straight, Kulasekara gets it away towards short third man off the edge
full ball outside off, defended towards cover
speared in towards middle and leg, cautiously defended by Kulasekara
Iftikhar keeps it steady, no room for the batsman to work with, and he blocks it back towards the bowler
shorter ball, Maharoof defends off the back foot towards point
on middle and leg this time, overpitched, Maharoof mistimes an attempted on-drive and the ball dribbles towards mid-on
bangs in a short ball, it didn't rise as much as Kulasekara expected it to, it still goes over the stumps after the batsman ducks under it
full ball outside off and Kulasekara opens the face of the bat to glide it towards third man for a single
Another bouncer, this time to Maharoof, and it bounces shoulder high this time, Maharoff manages to get under it
overpitched on off, batsman gets in the front foot and defends
on middle and leg, Kulasekara blocks it back to the bowler
the googly surprises Kulasekara, who just about manages to keep that one out
the leg spinner this time, Kulasekara pats it back to the bowler
ovepitched delivery, on off stump, Kulasekara doesn't get it away, defending it dourly
this time he gets a single as Afridi strays onto leg, turned behind square for a single
Kulasekara gets off the strike with a punch down to mid-on
played with an angled bat, the ball runs away towards third man for a single
pushes it firmly down the ground, and the ball ricochets off the stumps at the bowler's end, allowing the batsmen the time to pinch a single
bouncer, superbly directed, on middle and leg, Maharoof keeps it out awkwardly, and the ball dribbles away towards short midwicket
worked away to deep square leg, making use of Iftikhar's poor line on leg stump, and that's another single
on the pads again, and that's yet another easy single, Maharoof drives off the backfoot towards mid-on
speared into middle and leg, Maharoof gets it away to mid-on
full ball on the pads, turned away to deep backward square leg
tossed up, good length, Kulasekara plays it with soft hands towards cover point for a single
straighter one on the pads, Maharoof misses out on an easy scoring opportunity
length ball, outside off, Maharoof leans into an off drive, single results
width provided, but Kulasekara doesn't accept it, content to let the ball go through to the keeper
good-looking drive from Maharoof, but it doesn't beat the fielder at mid-off
slightly slower ball, moves a bit away from the batsman, who manages to glide it to third man
attempts a similar stroke, but is beaten by a length ball outside the of stump
short of a length, on off and middle, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
attempts the bouncer, but is ill-directed, slipping down the leg side and he'll have to bowl that ball again
some room provided, the batsman opens the face of the bat to push it towards cover point, they take a single, and help themselves to an overthrow as well
overpitched, a good-looking drive from the batsman, the sweeper on the of side, Misbah-ul-Haq, does the fielding but the batsmen have enough time to take a couple
down the leg side, turned to square leg
length ball on the pads, swept to backward square leg
swept hard once more but he picks out the square leg fielder
tries to punch it towards midwicket, but deosn't beat the infield
driven straight to midwicket again
unable to beat the fielder at midwicket again
bouncer on off stump, Kulasekara sees it early and ducks under it comfortably
shortish ball, on off stump, Kulasekara only manages to pat it back towards the bowler
superb delivery from Gul, keeping it on a tight line around off stump, the batsman doesn't get any space to work with, and he again plays it back toward the bowler
ovepritched in middle stump, Kulasekara thrashes that uppishly towards midwicket
holds back the length a bit, Kulasekara gets it away to backward square leg
Maharoof goes for the booming drive, but doesn't connect with a wide delivery outside off
tossed up, down the leg side, paddle sweeps it very fine down the leg side to pick up a boundary, it's a very quick outfield in Karachi
nudged to short fine leg, and the batsmen manage to steal a single

Maharoof's gone, Sri Lanka seem to have developed a knack of losing wickets just as a partnership is developing,  Maharoof sweeps Malik in the air but only manages to find Misbah-ul-Haq at the midwicket boundary
a thick inside edge and the ball trickles away behind square leg
played with soft hands towards backward point
flighted delivery, on middle and leg, Murali finds the fielder at short fine leg

short of a length ball, moving a bit away from the batsmen, Kulasekara is drawn towards it and nicks it through to the keeper, that's another Sri Lankan wicket going down after a stroke which involved no footwork
he presents a solid defence to a length delivery on middle
a bouncer on leg stump, Mendis didn't know much about that, manages to gets it away to the left of the keeper, a slight mix-up before the batsmen go through for a single
short of a length ball on off, Murali takes a step back and defends it very cautiously
another bouncer, this time to Murali, who manages to evade it quite easily
Predictably, after the boucner, a yorker, this one's on leg stump, Murali manages to squeeze it out towards square leg
a bouncer on legstump, Murali pulls it and gets a top edge which runs away for four as fine leg is inside the circle
a high full toss, high enough to be called a no-ball, Murali swings at it but takes a blow on his gloves, manages to steal a single
And that's the end of the innings, Mendis goes for a Hollywood drive, he misses completely as the ball moves in a little and crashes into middle stump.

inn2.comm: forces him on the backfoot straightaway, he rocks back very close to his stumps and keeps it away to cover
slashes really hard outside the offstump without moving his feet or getting under the ball
gets across his stumps and pushes it on the walk to mid-off
gets his front foot across the stumps and watchfully lets it go
gets it to come back in and Manzoor shapes to cut but is forced to play very close to the body
defends towards cover point with an angled bat and decides against the single
lands it on a fullish length outside off and he gets a good stride forward and defends to the covers
angles it in line with the middle stump and he waits on it before flicking the ball wide of square leg
gets just a fraction of width outside off and he slashes hard and meets thin air
a little fuller in length and he stays back at the crease and slashes hard again, he fails to make contact
edged but falls short, the ball angles away from him and Jayawardene does well at second slip to dive to his right and cut it off
gets behind the line and pats it away to the covers
skids it through around the off stump and he offers the full face of the bat and pushes it to mid-on
angles it on the pads, he stays at the backfoot and clips it with ease in to the gap between mid-on and midwicket, the quick outfield does the rest
a little shorter in length, he gets on the backfoot and tucks it to the on side
angles it towards the offstump, he gets behind the line and defends
sticks to the same line and length, he pushes it softly through the line to mid-off
fuller in length, he softly taps it away to mid-on
is a little cramped for room to but but he plays it late and glides it past backward point
bangs in the bouncer, he lets that sail over his head
this one skids off the pitch and raps him high on the pads and rolls to the off side
gets across his stumps and clips it towards midwicket
keeps a little low outside off but he gets his bat fully behind the line and angles it towards slip
gets a bit of width outside off and cuts to point
nice bouncer, it fizzes past Manzoor's helmet just as he ducks and evades it
gets fully across his stumps and watches it through before reaching the keeper
gets behind the line to a good length ball and defends
mixes it up with a yorker length ball outside off which he digs out back to the bowler
wants to work it away to the on side but he gets a thick inside edge onto his boot
gets width outside off and he cuts it to square third man
comes back in off the pitch, he gets back and across and defends
nearly slices him in half as he withdraws the shot, the ball clips his pads and rolls just wide of slip
that's a very good bouncer, Butt does well to get on his knee and evade it
taps it in front of point and sets off, Manzoor's quick and he makes his ground just before Dilshan under arms the ball on the stumps
lands it outside off and he shoulders arms
holds the length back outside off and he defends down the pitch
just short of a length and Butt does well to get in to position for the flick early, the ball straightens on his pads and he times the flick well past midwicket
good length on middle and he pushes it to the on side
full on middle and he forces it back to the bowler
bangs it in short and the ball climbs just over the region of the offstump, he gets his elbows high and pulls it powerfully past midwicket
full outside off and he drives it firmly to cover and a misfield allows a boundary, three fours in this over
pushes a full toss to mid-off
a length ball angling across Manzoor, who shoulders arms
back of a length, on middle and off, turned towards square leg but straight to the fielder
dropped with short hands towards point, where Dilshan is extremely alert and moves quickly to cut off the single
short and a little bit of room, upper cut over the infield towards third man
that was a poor ball, width provided, and Butt  crashes it past point for a boundary
much better ball to finish the over, closer to the stumps, Butt plays it with soft hands and thinks of a single but decides against it
low full toss, on middle and leg, Manzoor gets his first boundary, flicking it off his toes to the square leg boundary
slower ball, bowled from the back of the hand, outside off and Manzoor lets it go through to the keeper
length ball, in the corridor outside off, Manzoor gets behind the line of the ball and defends it back to the bowler
Kulasekara is operating in the mid-120s range here, that was also outside off, and left alone by Manzoor
punched firmly to extra cover, but the placement was poor, straight to the fielder, another dot ball, good comeback by Kulasekara after starting off with a boundary ball
full ball on off, and yet another dot ball to finish the over, blocked back towards Kulasekara
good tight line from Thushara, Butt is looking to be aggressive but on this occasion he is content to get behind the line and defend
a little bit of width, Butt glides it behind backward point for a single
length ball, pitching on off and angling away, Manzoor gets a stride in and drives powerfully but again can't beat the field
on middle and leg this time, and Manzoor can't get this one away either
a touch of frustration evident in Manzoor's batting now, that was just outside off but Manzoor tried to cut it powerfully, mistimes it towards the bowler
a bit more width this time, and Manzoor manages to cut that away to third man
Kulasekara keeps it nice and tight, around the offstump, Kulasekara taps it back to the bowler
slower ball outside off, Manzoor tried to turn it to the leg side but is beaten in his attempt
gently played towards mid-on, and Manzoor manages to sneak a single
a slower ball, some space provided to free the arms, but Butt can only nudge it towards the backward point fielder
full ball, on middle and leg, Butt tries to get it away tow2ards midwicket, but inside edge it on to his pads
This time Butt gets his placement right, as he pokes a wide delivery behind Dilshan at backward point for a single
again Butt is given some width, and he helps himself to a single by guiding it to third man
Manzoor gets some room to free his arms, and he tries to thrash it through cover, timing isn't quite right but he gets it away to the sweeper
flicks it off his hip behind square on the leg side
on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
back of a length, on off stump, nudged towards mid-off, quick running helps the batsmen steal a single
finishes the over with a dot ball, Butt tries to upper cut that but doesn't connect with it
shortish ball, outside off, Manzoor does what he has been attempting for a while now - trying to cut deliveries that aren't very wide - he inside-edges it on to his boots
much fuller delivery, and there was some width this time, Manzoor tries to hit it hard through the covers but can't find the gap
good tight line from Maharoof, Manzoor tries to execute an inside-out cover drive, timing isn't right, and it trickles back to the bowler
the slower bouncer, Maharoof rolls his fingers over the seam, Manzoor goes for the pull but connects only with air
that spoils what was a good over so far, slightly overpitched on offstump and Manzoor flicks that in the air over the infield to the midwicket boundary
defended to point off the front foot
tries a bouncer, pitches on off and goes over middle and leg, Butt spots it early and easily ducks under it
bangs in the bouncer again, this time it's a little too much down the leg side for the umpire's liking
lovely shot, the timing was perfect as Butt dispatches a length ball between extra cover and mid-off for a boundary
strays on to the pads, Butt helps himself to two runs by guiding it down to fine leg
again on the legs and Butt glances it down to fine leg again
shortish ball on off, Manzoor gets behind the line of the ball and defends off the back foot, bottom hand comes off the bat as he keeps that one out
length ball, angling across Butt, who leans in to drive towards extra cover
slower ball, hardly any room to work with, but Butt manages to deftly dab that towards third man for a single
length ball, on off, Manzoor opens the face to run the ball down to third man, good running from him helps the batsmen get a couple

run-out chance there, Manzoor drives it firmly to mid-on and sets off for a single, Butt wasn't interested but Manzoor didn't turn back till he was halfway down the pitch, Kulasekara throw was poor though, and Manzoor might have just made it anyway
defended towards point off the back foot
on leg stump this time, and Manzoor picks up an easy two by nudging it behind square
there's some turn on offer, Butt plays it towards point
ooh! beaten, this turns less but Butt ends up playing inside the line of that one
gets on the front foot, nearer to the pitch of the ball, and drives it to long-off
a lot of width for Manzoor to play his favourite cut shot, and he gets it away behind point
on leg stump, jabbed to the left of the bowler, batsmen pinch a single before Murali can complete the fielding
heaved towards midwicket for a single to end the over
on middle and leg, Manzoor whips it towards square leg, Manzoor hustles the fielders, calling for the second, makes it comfortably
opens the face of the bat to glide it to a wide third man, Manzoor seems to have worked his way out of the rut that tied him down early in the innings
this time Butt tries to guide it to third man, though it was pretty close to offstump, doesn't make contact
driven to the left of mid-off but can't get a single
outside the leg stump, Butt comes down the track and flicks it away to the midwicket boundary, the outfield is extremely quick here
Butt is squared up an offstump delivery, the ball squirts away behind point off the outside edge
Sri Lanka persist in giving Manzoor room outside off, he cracks that past point where a misfield fetches him a boundary
dabbed towards point for a single
watchfully defended off the front foot by Butt
wide outside off but Butt was backing away from the stumps, he cuts it but straight to backward point
This time he stand his ground and drives it to mid-off for a single
tossed up, on middle and leg, turned away towards deep square leg
offspinner to start with, nudged to midwicket for a single
Butt gets on the front foot and defends
Butt gets some space to free his arms and he lashes it square leg
full on middle and leg, Manzoor gets in a tangle playing that, it eventually dribbles towards the bowler
wide ball and Manzoor rocks on the back foot and slams it past point for a boundary
and another boundary to end the over, this time to square leg, Pakistan's run-rate getting a move on here
nicely flighted delivery, pitches outside off and carries on, Butt lets that one go
and again, closer to the stumps, Butt gets a thick outside edge towards the cover
pitching on leg stump, Manzoor turns it to short fine leg for a single
a doosra this time, tossed up, Butt defends it back to the bowler
very wide outside off, Butt cuts it away to deep point
on leg stump, Manzoor tries to get a single to short fine leg again, but doesn't get hold of the ball
overpitched outside off, Butt punches it to mid-off
pitching on middle and leg, Butt pushes it towards cover
inside edged by Butt to square leg, he was looking to play that to the off
strays down leg, easily whipped away to deep backward square leg
on off and Butt gets on the front foot and defends
on middle and leg, Butt flicks but can't beat the fielder at midwicket
again on the leg side, Manzoor wristily works it away behind square
nicely tossed up, but Butt comes down the track to get to the pitch and drives down to long-off
Manzoor was a little early on that shot, played a touch uppishly back to the bowler,that was a doosra
sweeps a full toss to deep backward square for a single
Butt has used his feet well against the spinners, again he comes down the tarck to punch it down to long-off
length ball outside off, Manzoor takes a long stride out to smother the spin as he defends
angling across the left-hander, who leans into an off drive
on middle and leg, Butt tries another off drive but doesn't get the timing right
this time the cover drive goes straight to the fielder
brings up his half-century with a blow towards deep extra cover
length ball on leg, Manzoor is happy to defend off the back foot
backs away to give himself room and cut it away to third man for a single which helps him retain the strike,

Manzoor is drawn on to the front foot by the doosra, he gets beaten, appeal for a stumping, he had his foot in the air briefly, third umpire is taking a very long time to give his decision, and it is not out, it looks as if Manzoor has just about managed to get his foot back on the ground in time
flighted ball on offstump, Manzoor flicks it to short midwicket
straighter ball, Manzoor defends off the back foot
very full ball, Manzoor goes for the sweep, just about manages to get it away towards short fine leg
nicely tossed up, defended off the front foot
flighted delivery again, on the stumps, played to mid-on
starts off with a length ball outside off, defended by Butt towards cover
a bit of air from Jayasuriya, Butt gets on his knees and picks the ball up and deposits it to the midwicket boundary, placement was superb on that shot
this time played off the backfoot towards mid-on
on leg stump, defended watchfully by Manzoor
this time on middle and off, again Manzoor gets on the front foot and offers a dead bat
finishes the over with three dot balls, as Manzoor defends with exaggerated caution
again Murali flights it, Butt gets on the front foot and carves it towards deep point
flighted on middle and leg, Manzoor works it to square leg
solid front foot defence from Manzoor
clipped towards short midwicket, thinks of a single but decides against it
again Manzoor shows his tight front foot defensive technique
sliding down leg, Butt helps himself to a single by swatting that to square leg
outside the right-handers leg stump this time, swept down to fine leg
wide outside off, Butt can't capitalise on that
on the stumps this time, Butt jabs it back to the bowler
driven to long-on for a single, the runs are coming fairly easily for Pakistan now
opens the face to run it down to third man but short third man is quickly onto the ball
Butt has backed himself to play Murali off the front foot, drives him towards cover this time
this time the off drive does fetch a single
down the leg side, nudged for a single
doosra, hits Butt on the knee roll but that was missing leg stump
Butt keeps the strike rotating with a dab to the off side
the doosra again, Manzoor glides that towards backward point
again Jayasuriya gives Manzoor a simple single but firing it into his pads
this time on the left-hander's pads, Butt doesn't connect but gets a couple of leg byes to fine leg
a repeat of the previous boundary off Jayasuriya, Butt gets under it and lofts it to the wide long-on boundary
and a single to mid-on to follow the boundary
Manzoor nurdles it behind square for another single
Butt plays it square on the off side to complete the over with yet another single
flighted ball on middle, Butt gets on the front foot and drives to long-on
dabs it very riskily to the left of third man, that brings up his half-century
dour defence from Manzoor
played with soft hands towards point for a single
down the leg side, the spinners are giving away a little too many easy runs to Pakistan, Butt helps it down to fine leg
on middle and off, Manzoor gets a big stride in and turns it behind square
starts with a leg-stump offering, nudged to square leg
offcutter, back of a length and comes in after pitching just outside off, defended off the back foot
Manzoor drops it almost at his feet and sets off for a single, Butt sends him back
short ball, and the width provided makes it very easy for Manzoor to glide it to third man
Butt comes down the track and jabs the ball towards mid-off
very close to the offstump, but Manzoor manages to dab it towards backward point
tossed up by Mendis, on off stump, and Manzoor launches that one down the ground, cracking shot
this time he pushes it towards square leg
Bang! he smashes Mendis down the ground again after backing away to give himself some room
defended off the front foot back to the bowler
again a rather risky shot from Manzoor, as he late cuts a ball from just outside off stump
a bit of space provided, Butt crunches that over extra cover for a boundary
this time he pushes it to mid-on for a comfortable single
short of a length on off stump, Manzoor unleashes a ferocious pull but Jayawardene cuts it off at midwicket
bouncer from Maharoof, Manzoor has no problems getting under that one
Manzoor looking for a single behind square leg, but he doesn't time his glance too well, and the ball ends up rolling dangerously close to the stumps
that one came back into the batsman, Manzoor was trying to play it to third man, the ball goes through to the keeper, and there's a big appeal for caught behind but the umpire isn't interested
Butt plays it to mid-on for another comfortable single
the legspinner, Manzoor doesn't pick it, lunges forward and gets a bit of an edge, he had part opened the face as well, and the ball runs down to the third man boundary
on middleand leg, Manzoor gets on the front foot and jabs it towards midwicket
that was on middle stump, Manzoor backs away and thumps it to long-off for a single
solid front-foot defence from Salman Butt to end the over
a bit of width, shortish ball, Manzoor throws everything at it, a bit of a top edge as the ball flies towards third man
on the pads, and glanced off his hip to fine leg for a single
a bouncer on offstump, Manzoor pulls for a boundary, a desperate dive at the boundary by Kapugedera but it is in vain
length ball on off this time, tapped back to the bowler by Manzoor
a half-volley, driven powerfully but finds the man at mid-off
short and a bit of width, Manzoor lashes that to sweeper cover on the off side boundary
straight ball on middle, Manzoor gets a stride in to defends, gets an inside edge towards the leg stump
this time Manzoor blocks it back to Mendis
goes for a powerful cut, but bottom edges it dangerously close to the stumps
big appeal for lbw, Manzoor attempt at the sweep misses the ball, that was just turning a bit towards leg which convinces the umpire to rule it not out
a square cut gets him off thestrike
pushed towards long-off
raps Butt on the pads, a stifled appeal for lbw, but that pitched outside leg
Butt comes down the track to drive inside-out, he hits it firmly, but straight to cover
played with soft hands towards the off side
no soft hands from Manzoor, he thrashes that over extra cover for a couple
another powerful drive from Manzoor, but finds the man at mid-off this time
a full ball on offstump, squeezed out towards deep backward point
first wicket down for Pakistan, a flighted delivery, on offstump, Manzoor looks to launch Murali down the ground, but only manages to smash it back to the bowler
tossed up again, pitching just outside off, Younis defends watchfully off the front foot
again flighted, but the doosra this time, Younis steps out and drives him to long-on to get off the mark
pitching on off, Butt also gets on the front foot and punches towards mid-on fora single
another tight single, Younis plays it softly to mid-off and calls immediately
pitching outside off and coming into the left hander, Butt  tries to turn it towards midwicket but doesn't get the timing right
Kulasekara starts with a short of length ball on off stump, Younis gets on the front foot and pats it back to the bowler
on middle and off, Younis gets behind the line of the ball and jabs it towards cover
a little bit of width given, Younis lashes it off the front foot to the point boundary, very little margin for error in the Powerplay
full ball on middle and leg, Younis can't get that one beyond mid-on
good, tight line, Younis leans into it and tries to drive through mid-off the off but mistimes it to mid-off
No problem with the timing on that shot, overpitched and Younis plays a beautiful straight drive
down the leg side, easy picking for Butt who helps it to fine leg
turned behind square by Younis this time for another comfortable single
Butt backs away to thump the offspinner past cover, but deosn't quite get hold of it
doosra from Murali, cramps Butt for room, but he manages to get it away to the leg side
big offbreak, Younis was backing away but that followed him and he can't get it away for runs
front-foot no-ball from Murali, Younis turns it round the corner
Butt  makes great use of the free-hit, uses his feet, getting near the pitch of the ball and lofts it over extra cover for a boundary
short ball and a bit of width, Younis backs away and thrashes that through cover
short of a length ball, just outside off, Butt pokes it towards backward point for a single
slower ball, similar length but closer to the stumps, Butt whips it towards mid-on
Shot! length ball outside off, Butt gets down on his knee and launches it over extra-cover yet again
good comeback form Thushara, a yorker homing in on leg stump, Butt digs it out towards midwicket
really poor delivery from Thushara to end the over, the fine leg's up but he sends the ball whistling down leg and Butt says 'thank you' and helps himself to a boundary
backfoot drive from Younis, in the air for a while, but lands safely in the midwicket region
wide outside off, Younis backs away and frees his arms, a rasping square cut fetches another boundary
watchfully defended off the front foot
doosra this time but Younis read it, adjusts late to play the ball towards the off
big offspinner which Younis ends up playing on the back foot well outside leg stump
blocked towards the off side by Butt
cautiously defended by Butt off the front foot
flighted delivery, on off stump, Butt plays with soft hands towards point
cuts it powerfully to the sweeper cover on the boundary
Younis takes a step away from leg stump and hammers it towards long-on
Butt gets on the front foot and drives firmly, but finds the man at extra cover
back of a length, Younis steps down the track but can only bunt it back to the bowler
Younis Khan goes, full ball on leg stump, Younis was a bit early on the shot, and scoops a simple catch to the mid-on fielder
in the channel outside off, on a length, Malik gets behind the line and defends towards point
strays towards the leg stump, Malik helps it on its way to fine leg
slower ball outside off, Butt carves it towards cover for a single
bouncer on off stump, Malik jumps as he dabs it to third man
driven down to long-on for a comfortable single
driven through the covers, and good running from the batsmen helps them take two and Butt moves on to 99
overpitched on middle and leg, Butt drives it to mid-off, no run
Hundred for Butt, this time he plays it a little to the left of mid-off which gives him time to pinch a single
driven to long-on by Malik for a single
tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
That was on offstump, but it didn't deter Malik from late-cutting it to third man
length ball on middle and off, Malik defends off the back foot
overpitched, Malik crunches that inside-out after getting the front foot out of the way, finds the gap between mid-off and extra cover
tries that cheeky late cut again, could have easily nicked it to the keeper, but is beaten
and that's it, Malik nudges it off the pads towards midwicket to confirm the victory
